name: Colaboratory
description: Live collaborative jupyter notebook by Google. Also see Seedbank.

name: Co√∂rdinator
description: Open source project by Spotify to convert svg to x and y points. Could be useful for interesting visualization.

name: Five Thirty Eight Data
description: A collection of data used by fivethirtyeight.com.

name: Free Code Camp
description: Learn front end and full stack web development.

name: Kaggle
description: A site that holds data science competitions and has learning materials.

name: mLab
description: Online hosting for MongoDB, free up to 0.5 GB

name: ML5
description: A javascript library for high level machine learning. Developed by NYU.

name: Scikit Learn
description: A python library for high level machine learning.

name: Seedbank
description: A collection of interactive machine learning examples.

name: NumPy
description: A linear algebra library + support for Python Arrays.

name: Pandas
description: Data Analysis Library built on top of NumPy, added support for DataFrames.

name: MatPlotLib
description: Math Data Visualization tool, allows for object orientated creation of graphs.

name: Seaborn
description: Data Visualization took built on top of MatPlotLib, allows for graphs on top of Pandas DataFrames.

name: Plotly
description: Interactive Data Visualization tool (CuffLinks needs to be installed for Plotly to work with Pandas).

name: TensorFlow
description: Machine Learning framework built for Python.
